# pan

**Instance Property**

The bus’s stereo pan.

## Declaration

```swift
var pan: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `0.0`, and the range of valid values is `-1.0` to `1.0`. Only the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEnvironmentNode] class implements this property.
title: pan
